name: Late to Work (bluegamemc)
description:
Fight your boss, Bob, to the death in a rage fueled battle that resulted from you being 10 minutes late to work.

Complete with Gameboy graphics and a soundtrack, this game assures 3-10 minutes of fun!

Made in 2 weeks for GDKO Round 3 (I didn't have time to work on it for most the first week but I'm still happy with how it came out)
